transaction.form.title: fr_Transaction Template: Regulatory Enrolment Process (REP)
device.name: fr_Name of Device, as it appears on the label
has.app.info: fr_Application information XML included in transaction?
requester.title: fr_Requester of solicited information
are.fees: fr_Are new fees or revised fees associated with this transactions?
is.deferral: fr_A deferral of payment is requested with this transaction
is.remission: fr_Fee Remission is requested with this transaction
gross.revenue: fr_The anticipated gross revenue for this device during the fee verification period
class2.eligible.remission: fr_You are eligible to apply for fee remission. The anticipated gross revenue is less than $100 000 and $350 fee is greater than 2.5% of the anticipated gross revenue.
class2.not.eligible.remission: fr_You are not eligible to apply for fee remission. The anticipated gross revenue is greater than $100 000 and/or $350 fee is less than 2.5% of the anticipated gross revenue.
class34.eligible.remission: fr_You are eligible to apply for fee remission. The anticipated gross revenue is less than $100 000 and full fee is greater than 2.5% of the anticipated gross revenue.
class34.not.eligible.remission: fr_You are not eligible to apply for fee remission. The anticipated gross revenue is greater than $100 000 and/or full fee is less than 2.5% of the anticipated gross revenue.
signed.statement: fr_A statement signed by the individual responsible for the applicant’s financial affairs is included to certify that the fee payable is greater than 10% of the anticipated gross revenue.
deferral.supporting: fr_The statement supporting the deferral request is included.
class2.include.doc: fr_Please include the required signed statement AND at least one of the support documentation to establish that anticipated gross revenue during the fee verification period is $100,000 or less, and certifying that the normal payment amount of $350 is more than an amount equal to 2.5% of the anticipated gross revenue.
class34.include.doc: fr_Please include the required signed statement AND at least one of the support documentation to establish that anticipated gross revenue during the fee verification period is $100,000 or less, and certifying that the fee indicated is more than an amount equal to 2.5% of the anticipated gross revenue.
class2.signed.statement: fr_A statement signed by the individual responsible for the applicant’s financial affairs indicating that the  anticipated gross revenue during the fee verification period is $100,000 or less, and certifying that the normal payment amount of $350 is more than an amount equal to 2.5% of the anticipated gross revenue (Required for class II)
class34.signed.statement: fr_A statement signed by the individual responsible for the applicant’s financial affairs indicating that the anticipated gross revenue during the fee verification period is $100,000 or less, and certifying that the fee indicated is more than an amount equal to 2.5% of the anticipated gross revenue (Required for class III/IV)
marketing.plan: fr_Marketing plan/product plan for the medical device
sales.history: fr_Sales history prior to product upgrades or sales history of similar products
market.estimates: fr_Estimated market share (that is [i.e.], product’s market potential compared to the total market for similar products in Canada)
comparison: fr_Comparison to similar products on the Canadian market or other similar markets (e.g. United States, European Union, etc.)
review.fees: fr_Review fees and remission processing fee must not be included with the submission, supplement or application. Sponsor will be invoiced for the applicable fee.
classification.change: fr_Change to the classification of a device
licence.change: fr_Change in the licence and/or device name
process.change: fr_Significant change in manufacturing process, facility of equipment
quality.change: fr_Significant change in manufacturing quality control procedures
design.change: fr_Significant change in design or performance
labelling.change: fr_Significant change in the labelling of the device
safety.change: fr_Any change which could affect the safety and effectiveness of the device
purpose.change: fr_Change to the purpose/indication of a device
fileio.msg.parseFail: fr_Parsing of the file has failed
fileio.msg.dataTypeError: fr_Error: the wrong form data was selected for this form.
error.mgs.dossier.id: fr_Please specify a valid dossier ID.
error.mgs.company.id: fr_Please specify a valid manufacturer company ID.
error.mgs.contact.id: fr_Please specify a valid manufacturer contact ID.
error.mgs.regu.company.id: fr_Please specify a valid regulatory company ID.
error.mgs.regu.contact.id: fr_Please specify a valid regulatory manufacturer contact ID.
error.mgs.licence.number: fr_Please specify a valid licence number.
error.mgs.application.number: fr_Please specify a valid application number.
common.saveRevert: fr_Please save or revert the record
msg.err.jsonparse: fr_There was an error parsing the working file.
msg.err.xmlparse: fr_There was an error parsing the draft XML file.
msg.err.file.load: fr_There was a problem loading the file.
msg.err.file.type: fr_An invalid file type was selected.
msg.err.form.type: fr_The wrong form type was selected for this form.
msg.err.checksum.fail: fr_The checksum in the file does not match the calculated checksum
